text:
[Verse]
Under the clouds
We spin around
Feeling the beat
Feet on the ground

[Verse 2]
Drops on our skin
The storm within
Laughing so loud
Alive again

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Joy without the pain
Let the rhythm flow
Hearts aglow

[Verse 3]
Puddle jumps and twirls
As the world unfurls
Music in the air
Love
We share

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Joy without the pain
Let the rhythm flow
Hearts aglow

[Bridge]
No worries
No shame
Just the melody's name
Together we sway
Till the break of day
title: Dancing in the Rain
